articles.description: IPL 2025: Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) claimed their title in 2024 while Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) finished as the runners-up. Will KKR manage to defend their crown come IPL 2025?
articles.content: IPL 2025: The seveneeth edition of the Indian Premier League (IPL) came to an end with the Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) dominating Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) in the final on May 26, 2024 (Sunday). It w… [+2257 chars]
